file_content.text: Sith, we owe you everything.
Betrayer Fetzellen's blood dries on our claws, but his bones still crunch fresh in our ears.
Let your revenge against the Talz fuel your anger.
Remember that feeling.
We are.
Do others of your kind share these grisly obsessions?
Are all Talz this morbid?
We are unique among the clan. Our tastes make us strong.
Fetzellen is just another cold body.
Get over it.
Sith does not understand. Talz clan is cleansed. We cannot forget.
Sith sates our hunger. For that, we serve you. We fight, maul and die for your clan.
Obey me, and you'll kill thousands by my side.
See that you do.
Sith has nothing to fear.
Your brutality is welcome, Broonmark.
I'm glad to have you.
We do not disappoint.
Your purpose is not lively conversation.
Silence, Broonmark.
Sith is right.
Battle calls. We are ready.
The Talz clan rejects us. But we are an outsider no longer.
Sith understands our hunger. Sith knows the glory of a bloodbath.
Sith guides us. Sith shows us how to hunt, how to kill, when to spare.
Our life belongs to Sith clan. Our every kill is in your honor.
You pledged your life to me, Broonmark. Don't ever forget that.
Your loyalty isn't optional.
We always remember our promise.
The more blood on my hands, the better.
Delightful.
We keep Sith drenched in sacrifice.
Your respect is well-placed, Broonmark.
You flatter me.
Sith deserves the bloodiest tribute.
When Sith clan grows, we teach new members to kill. We train them in Sith's image.
We live to slay. But Sith clan shows us more.
Your cruelty is art. Your massacres, perfection.
You spare the wounded so they spread fear. Others you kill and savor.
We watch Sith. We grow stronger.
Murder is simple. To truly devastate your enemies, you must learn to crush their hope.
You still have much to learn.
We hunger for your training.
You're wise to aspire to my greatness.
I set an impressive example.
Sith strength is unequaled. We are lucky to serve Sith clan.
Impressive progress. Persist, and you'll be the most fearsome Talz in the galaxy.
You adapt quickly.
We are glad to please Sith clan.
Now unleash us on your enemies. Let us show our skill. Let us bloody our claws.
Sith honors us with attention.
We watch Sith kill. We see power and strength. Everything that is lost to the Talz clan.
They are too passive. Our claws do not grow to sign treaties. They exist to maim, to slash, to kill!
The Talz lap up the Republic's promises of peace. Soon your kind will be their obedient pawns.
The Republic is to blame.
Sith sees much.
Those claws are destined to inflict the most painful of wounds.
Don't forget "mutilate."
Yes! We slash our enemies into wet little pieces!
The Talz may be capable of more than mass murder.
Perhaps you're mistaken.
No! Peace rots our clan. We are built to slice meat from bone.
The Republic stole the Talz clan's instincts. They enslave our clan. They make us weak.
Now we are the last Talz with ancestor's strength. We must avenge our clan. We must slaughter the Republic!
We won't stop until the Republic is decimated.
Revenge will be yours.
We hunger for their pain.
I am your master, Broonmark. Your vendetta occurs on my terms.
Remember your place.
We swear our life to Sith clan. We serve no other.
Forget your weak brethren. Only the strong deserve to survive.
The Talz don't need avenging.
Blood must be spilled. Our enemies must be punished.
Call on us when Republic clan comes. We ravage them.
What's on your mind, Broonmark?
The Talz home planet. Alzoc Three is calm, icy, peaceful. Everything we hate.
The frozen prison traps us for years. Finally we argue with a pathetic Talz. Then blood-drenched snow, claws slick. Our first kill.
Slaying defenseless Talz is beneath you. Now you hunt worthy prey.
You've come a long way.
Yes. Sith clan gives us victims worthy of our claws.
But that first taste leads to great hunger. To escape our docile homeworld, our young self enlists with the Republic.
The peaceful Talz don't respond well to murder?
Did you become a fugitive?
Our younger self is shunned. Enlists with the Republic to escape our docile homeworld.
The thrill of choking off that first life... I'll never forget it.
I remember my first kill....
Sith knows the hunger. Our younger self enlists with the Republic to feed it. And to escape our docile homeworld.
Now we stink of shame. The Republic's stench clings to our fur.
It was your destiny. Without them, you wouldn't serve me now.
Regret nothing.
We prize our place in Sith clan.
You'll reek of Republic frailty until the day you die.
You're a disgrace.
Spilling Republic blood cleanses us. They pay for our corruption.
You've long since surpassed the Republic's pathetic order.
Cheer up, Broonmark.
Sith clan honors us.
Now, we grow hungry. Let us kill.
The battlefield is no place for talk. Speak to us on Sith ship.
We have thoughts to speak.
We have no words for the Sith.
Our claws dry while we wait.
We wait for clan leader's strike.
Why does our hunt slow?
Less talk. More blood.
We smell the Sith clan's enemies.
Talk slows bloodshed.
Clan leader wants advice? Kill, tear, ravage!
How can we serve the clan?
A still clan is a weak clan.
Words don't sate our hunger.
No talk. Clan leader points, we kill.
Our claws talk for us.
We hunger to serve the clan.
Unleash us!
